statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeRecords;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM EmployeeRecords WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM EmployeeRecords ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM EmployeeRecords WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeRecords WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeRecords WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM EmployeeRecords WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM EmployeeRecords GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeRecords WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM EmployeeRecords WHERE department = 'HR' AND hire_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees;
SELECT schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM work_schedules;
SELECT certification_name, certification_type FROM training_certifications;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM employees JOIN work_schedules ON employees.employee_id = work_schedules.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT certification_name, certification_type FROM training_certifications WHERE certification_type = 'Online' ORDER BY certification_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM work_schedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01' AND schedule_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN training_certifications ON employees.employee_id = training_certifications.employee_id WHERE certification_type = 'Onsite';
SELECT * FROM employee_records;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_records ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_certifications WHERE date_achieved BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT certification_name, employee_id FROM training_certifications WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Java%';
SELECT employee_id, start_date, end_date FROM work_schedules WHERE shift = 'Morning' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_records WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM employee_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC

SELECT certification_name, date_achieved FROM training_certifications INNER JOIN employee_records ON training_certifications.employee_id = employee_records.employee_id WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe'
SELECT * FROM work_schedules WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC
SELECT department, COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM employee_records GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_employees DESC
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT certification_name, issue_date, expiry_date FROM certifications WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM departments WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time, day_of_week FROM work_schedules WHERE employee_id = 456 AND day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT e.name, c.certification_name, c.issue_date FROM employees e JOIN certifications c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, w.start_time, w.end_time FROM employees e JOIN work_schedules w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id WHERE w.day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT d.department_name, e.name as manager FROM departments d JOIN employees e ON d.manager_id = e.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT hire_date, name, department FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM work_schedules WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY shift ASC;
SELECT cert_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE issue_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT e.name, e.department, c.cert_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN certifications c ON e.id = c.employee_id
SELECT p.position_title, p.salary, e.name FROM positions p INNER JOIN employees e ON p.position_id = e.id
SELECT e.name, e.hire_date, d.dept_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.dept_name
SELECT c.cert_name, c.issue_date, e.name FROM certifications c INNER JOIN employees e ON c.employee_id = e.id
SELECT e.name, w.start_date, w.end_date, w.shift FROM employees e INNER JOIN work_schedules w ON e.id = w.employee_id
